name: rsGet - The Download Daemon
short_description: rsGet is a revolutionary file downloader daemon with neat CLI and many options of the advanced GUI-ish downloaders like flashget.. mostly intended to be used on remote computers as a much better, faster, multi-file-downlaoder alternative of wget and curl
